title: Week 1 Lab: Introduction to Programming
description: Complete the basic programming exercises covering variables, data types, and control structures. Submit your code files along with a brief report explaining your solutions.

title: Project Proposal: Software Design
description: Submit a detailed project proposal for your semester project. Include problem statement, objectives, proposed methodology, and expected outcomes. Maximum 5 pages.

title: Final Report: Database Design Project
description: Complete and submit your final database design project report. Include ER diagrams, schema design, SQL implementation, and testing results. Present findings in a professional format.
